modShortDescription: Strictly speaking, due to its equilateralism, it is a universal symbol for the harmony of the divine and the earthly - but who knows that? Hail the Gods!
modDescription:
The mod is primarily intended to remove the cross, which is associated with Christianity. Strictly speaking, due to its equilateralism, it is a universal symbol for the harmony of the divine and the earthly – but who knows that? Hail the Gods!

**God Buff / Admin Tools**

* Recolored
* New Icon
* (optional) Valknut Icon
* \~ comment in via xml edit \~

If you use assets, all players need the mod.

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/EihwazDE/7D2D/-/archive/master/7D2D-master.zip?path=Polytheism)**

If you appreciate Eihwaz’s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.com/pools/c/8nSUn4KFGL).

If you need help, you can use this [support link](https://discord.com/invite/StrFn7X).
